recommended_degree: Sistem Informasi, Sistem Komputer, Teknik Komputer (Sarjana)
job_description:
Key Responsibilities :
- Support the Technical Project Manager in daily coordination and project activities.
- Help track tasks, deadlines, and progress using project management tools (Jira, Trello, Asana).
- Assist in preparing project documentation, meeting notes, and status updates.
- Coordinate with technical and non-technical teams to ensure smooth communication.
- Help monitor deliverables and follow up on pending tasks.
- Assist in basic testing coordination and release preparation.
- Participate in meetings and contribute simple feedback for process improvements.

Qualifications:
- Fresh graduate in Computer Science, Information Systems, Project Management, or related fields.
- Familiarity with Agile concepts and project management tools is a plus.
- Good communication and coordination skills.
- Organized, detail-oriented, and willing to learn.
-  Willing to work hybrid with 3 days per week WFO in Bandung.
- Placement in Bandung for MrScraper
